Messages.smooth_angle_len: Default smooth angle degree length, deg.
Messages.epsilon_s: Accuracy of linear movement, length mm
Messages.epsilon_r: Accuracy of linear movement, angle deg.
Messages.lawIterationStep: Step of trajectory iteration during spline building, mm
Messages.splineIterationStep: Step of spline iteration during frames building, ms
Messages.smoothAccelerationMmSec2: Acceleration for trajectory smoothing computing, mm/s^2
Messages.smoothTimeRate: Maximum allowed ratio of time of smoothed path to time of path with exact stop
Messages.smoothSafeMisrate: Allowed speed rate reduction on safe speed spline while smoothing
Messages.velocityComputingEpsilon: Velocity computing epsilon, fraction of path iteration step
Messages.WristMaxReorintationSpeed: Robot wrist or flange max speed during orientation changing on CP motion, mm/s
